title: Arcade Missions Not counting in AR-URF?
body: for the past few days, ive noticed the Missions have not been counting toward my progress in completing the missions. Has something changed?

replies.body: Which mission are you trying to complete?  I haven't seen any issues like this, but let's double check and see what the requirements are asking for!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Az2JYjnk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-19T19:01:59.134+0000)
>
> Which mission are you trying to complete?  I haven't seen any issues like this, but let's double check and see what the requirements are asking for!

I bought the arcade dungeon pass last night, and none of the first missions in the 3 story lines are not being counted in URF
